part.Name: Description
part.Short: An old, tattered piece of parchment, stains across the edges. It is scrawled on with an emotionally unstable hand. Perhaps it will lead us to someone?

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A modified Nano-Neuro Animator, designed by the Neuroparent fanatics to tweak the new mind to be friendlier. This new effect doesn't seem to work if you don't have what they call the {{nanoneuro|madness...}}

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A modified Spray-a-Brain formula, designed by mad Animators to realign the neural lattices to be more suggestively predisposed. This new effect doesn't seem to work if you don't have what they call the {{nanoneuro|madness...}}

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Found in a basket in a far away ruin, these pickles serve as some of the only clues you can find about the whereabouts of the mysterious fugitive... who would bring this many pickles to the jungle...?
